headline.main: ALLIED OFFICIALS REVIEW THE WAR; Davis Aide Says Nazis Who Boasted They Had Won Will Admit Defeat Soon POLAND'S FORCES GROW Fifth Among United Nations, Envoy Reports -- Critical Days of Britain Recounted

lead_paragraph: The first three years of the war were reviewed at a luncheon of the Overseas Press Club in the Belmont Plaza Hotel yesterday by Jan Ciechanowski, Polish Ambassador; Harold Beresford Butler, British Minister in Washington, and Douglas Miller, author and assistant to Elmer Davis, head of the Office of War Information.
abstract: United Nations officials rev war, Overseas Press Club
